publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4550 Stuart McMillan: Station Community Regeneration Fund—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by ScotRail that it is to invest £1 million to convert disused railway station buildings into community projects under their Station Community Regeneration Fund (SCRF); notes that a list of stations that could receive the funding has been drawn up by ScotRail and includes Fort Matilda, Inverclyde; further notes that the fund will see applications being submitted by community groups to make use of station buildings, and acknowledges the new opportunities that this fund could bring to communities in the way of employment and community involvement. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson
S3M-4550 Station Community Regeneration Fund (lodged on 1 July 2009) Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Christopher Harvie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*
